name: 8 Days
description:
Rice wars conflict has erupted in the east.

When the upper classes cannot get their daily sushi meals, the diplomatic forces enter into action. Peacekeepers are sent in to negotiate with John BigBoy, the local dictator to put an end to his worldwide rice embargo.

G.O.D. Inc. (Gold Oil and Diamonds Inc. – GOOD Nasdaq) has become the world leader in the Private Military Company (PMC) sector.

Its main business is to bring peace to those conflict areas where its clients have strategic interests. Your first mission as one of its disposable mercenaries is to move to the East and break the world rice embargo which is prohibiting the Western upper classes from enjoying their daily sushi.

Your goal is to persuade the local military dictator to end this embargo.

At the start of the game: Mission 1:

GOD has become the world leader in the private military company PMC sector.

Its main business is to bring peace to conflict areas where its clients have specific interests.

The first mission is to go to the East and break the world rice embargo.

You wake up in a cell, people are getting tortured and killed. You manage to grab a knife and stealth kill a guard and grab his AK47. You manage to break free from your jail and escape from your hell.

Grab your gun and kill some enemy!

8DAYS - Features:

- 8DAYS can be played in single mode and in local cooperative mode for 2 players.

- The game has a high replayable value, each chapter has hidden secrets.

- Enemies AI don't' follow a fixed pattern, each gameplay is always different.

- Level design allows players to solve levels in different ways every time they play.

- It features solid 2D arcade mechanics improved with 3D input controls (keyboard and mouse combination, dual stick gamepad).

At the end, 8DAYS is easy to learn but hard to master ;)
